00036 namespace lbann
00037 {
00038   class stacked_autoencoder : public sequential_model
00039   {
00040   public:
00042     stacked_autoencoder(uint mini_batch_size,
00043                         lbann_comm* comm,
00044                         layer_factory* _layer_fac,
00045                         Optimizer_factory* _optimizer_fac);
00046 
00048     ~stacked_autoencoder();
00049 
00050     void begin_stack(const std::string layer_name,
00051                      int layer_dim,
00052                      activation_type activation=activation_type::RELU,
00053                      weight_initialization init=weight_initialization::glorot_uniform,
00054                      std::vector<regularizer*> regularizers={});
00055 
00056     //void setup();
00058     void summarize(lbann_summary& summarizer);
00059 
00061 
00065     void train(int num_epochs, int evaluation_frequency=0);
00067     bool train_mini_batch(long *num_samples, long *num_errors);
00068 
00070     DataType evaluate(execution_mode mode=execution_mode::testing) { }
00072     bool evaluate_mini_batch(long *num_samples, long *num_errors) { }
00073 
00075     DataType reconstruction();
00076 
00077     bool reconstruction_mini_batch(long *num_samples, long *num_errors);
00078 
00080 
00082     DataType get_train_accuracy() const { return m_train_accuracy; }
00084     DataType get_validate_accuracy() const { return m_validation_accuracy; }
00086     DataType get_test_accuracy() const { return m_test_accuracy; }
00087 
00089     DataType get_reconstruction_accuracy() const { return m_reconstruction_accuracy; }
00090 
00091 
00092     //vector<Layer>& get_layers() const {return m_layers;}
